headline: Royal Caribbean Expansion Puts Valuation And Booking Momentum In Focus
summary: Royal Caribbean Group (NYSE:RCL) has ordered new Discovery Class ships from Chantiers de l'Atlantique, expanding its ocean cruise fleet. The company is planning to grow its Celebrity River Cruises operations, with an aim to roughly double its river cruise footprint. Management is highlighting booking momentum and operational upgrades across the fleet alongside these expansion plans. For you as an investor, this update is about how NYSE:RCL is building on its core cruise business across both...

headline: Royal Caribbean Says Two-Thirds Of 2026 Already Booked At Record Prices
summary: Royal Caribbean Group (NYSE:RCL) posted solid fourth-quarter results on Thursday as strong demand, higher yields, and cost controls supported year-over-year earnings growth to close out the year. The cruise operator reported adjusted earnings of $2.80 per share, in line with expectations, on revenue of $4.259 billion, which missed the $4.262 billion consensus estimate. GAAP EPS for the quarter was $2.76, compared with $2.02 a year earlier. Net income rose to $0.8 billion from $0.6 billion, while

headline: Could Royal Caribbean and Six Flags Be Lifelong Leisure Stocks for Your Portfolio?​
summary: Leisure stocks can provide good returns, if you can ride out the waves during economic downturns.
